mapper.update:
UPDATE depOffice
id = #{id},
department = #{department},
departmentId = #{departmentId},
applyMonth = #{applyMonth},
leaderId = #{leaderId},
leaderName = #{leaderName},
addDate = #{addDate},
modifiedDate = #{modifiedDate},
approveState = #{approveState},
userId = #{userId},
flag = #{flag},
pid = #{pid},
userName = #{userName},
WHERE 1=1 AND approveState = 'approve1'
AND modified = #{original}

UPDATE depOffice
approveState = #{approveState},
applyMonth = #{applyMonth},
modifiedDate = #{modifiedDate}
WHERE 1=1 AND approveState = 'approve1'
